Someday - Jan 08

Jan 18, 2008

Someday...

  • I would like to direct one half of a two director, non-traditional, casting of The Homecoming in repertory. There's something in this play - disturbing by itself - that seems to allow it to be played as a comedy or drama and also would lend it self well to two contrasting versions side by side. I think a non-traditional casting of the two would open up some interesting paths for both the audience and the creative team.
  • I would like to get my MFA in Directing from The Theatre School or Yale School of Drama.
  • I would like to direct Richard III.
  • I might like to act and sing in Les Miserables.
  • I would like to facilitate a meaningful conversation between a company of fine actors and an audience over a period of years and explore the ways in which they grow together in tastes and interpretation.
  • I would like to take a verse speaking workshop or class from Cic Berry.
  • I would like to take a Shakespeare course or workshop from Gary Taylor or Harold Bloom.

Technorati Tags: goals, someday
